content:
As we all know, our current location
is a world bubble.
So, the new Astralink wave led by Loomi Co....

I'll draw upon all my experience
to help everyone brew up
a better world together!

I hereby formally announce to Loomi Co.,
Our world bubble
Is ready to become a new member of the Astralink!

...so everyone!
Let us, as
Residents of Astralink 149597870...

Huh?
Such a long number is hard to remember...
Time to give this Astralink a proper name!

How about we each come up with one?
Then let's test our luck with a...
<size=64>Drawing of lots</size>!
I'm so happy!

It's about taking each <color=#97c344>World Bubble</color>,
developing them into pathways that connect worlds together,
that's why they're called <color=#97c344>"Astralinks"</color>.

Now, let me officially welcome everyone
to their new home in the <size=64>Astralink</size>~!
                  <size=28>Ahem, got a bit too loud there...</size>
And the name drawn is...
Do you all like it?
Alright!
Behind the Scenes

Although there aren't as many participants as we initially expected,
but...

You might not be familiar with this yet,
So let me explain what I mean by <color=#97c344>"Astralink"</color>.
Allow me to break it down for you.

Ahaha, that's all in the past! I've done many things,
but I've never tried building a World Bubble before,
and come to think of it, I've never really settled down anywhere...

*cough cough* So this world bubble,
whether for everyone else or for myself,
is a completely new experience - a first in this lifetime!

Please think carefully and
write your favorite name
on the Road Sign provided!
Let's work hard together!
Hi everyone!
Among the five road signs, Mobai picked one...

Alrighty alright!
Have you finished writing everything?
<color=#8AAB4B>{homestar} Road</color>!

Let me celebrate with flower tea,
Wishing everyone on <color=#97c344>{homestar} Road</color>
A life filled with happiness!

Before joining Loomi Co.,
I did academic research, worked as an explorer,
and organized gatherings in various places...

As the first settlers to make this our home,
let us bestow a name upon this Astralink...

Since everyone agrees,
let's name our Astralink
the <color=#8AAB4B>{homestar} Path</color>!

Alright,
Everything's ready!
Please take your seats...

Then let me pick
a lucky winner!

You won everyone's applause,
That was amazing!

What an interesting name!
Who came up with it...
Huh?! It was <color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>!

Thank you to Frostia, Sani, and Glenn for tidying up the Camp today,
and thanks to <color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>
for gathering branches and flowers to brew tea.

So, <color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>...
As the one who named this new Astralink,
would you like to say a few words?
